data_details.label: Working memory
data_details.docstring: All the facts in the working memory of current step

data_details.label: Fired rules from start
data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Goals/Subgoals
data_details.docstring: Goal and subgoals (with their respective rule) until this step. Achieved subgoals should be removed

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data: Since A and B is in working memory, rule 1 is fired and K was added to working memory
Since K and Q is in working memory, rule 7 is fired and W was added to working memory
Since G is in working memory, rule 10 is fired and R was added to working memory
Since Q and R is in working memory, rule 4 is fired and H was added to working memory
Since W and H is in working memory, rule 3 is fired and C was added to working memory
Since no more rules can be fired, C is the final decision
